title: Cyber-hygiene for highly-exposed journalists and activists
abstract: Discussion about real-world examples of journalists, academics, activists being targeted by powerful state actors. What are the best OPSEC, INFOSEC and cyber-hygiene practices for those faced with the crushing power of state lawfare and surveillance — and for their sources?
